abstract: At an industry conference in Berlin, David M. Rubenstein of the Carlyle Group and Leon Black of Apollo Global Management said European investments could provide attractive returns for those private equity firms willing to take the risk.
snippet: At an industry conference in Berlin, David M. Rubenstein of the Carlyle Group and Leon Black of Apollo Global Management said European investments could provide attractive returns for those private equity firms willing to take the risk.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN — European investments could provide significant returns for those private equity firms willing to take risk, according to David M. Rubenstein, co-founder of the Carlyle Group.

headline.main: Private Equity Giants Pitch European Assets

abstract: Deutsche Bank announced on Tuesday that it was in exclusive discussions to sell parts of its asset management business to Guggenheim Partners.
snippet: Deutsche Bank announced on Tuesday that it was in exclusive discussions to sell parts of its asset management business to Guggenheim Partners.
lead_paragraph: Deutsche Bank is nearing a deal to sell parts of its asset management business to Guggenheim Partners.

headline.main: Guggenheim Partners in Talks for Deutsche Bank Asset Management Units
